metadata.title: CVE-2018-10392 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: mapping0_forward in mapping0.c in Xiph.Org libvorbis 1.3.6 does notvalidate the number of channels, which allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (heap-based buffer overflow or over-read) or possiblyhave unspecified other impact via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: libvorbis: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
